EmailTemplate.name: E-Sig Expired
EmailTemplate.subject: E-Sig Expired
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for using LegalZoom.
We have previously sent 3 email reminders to electronically sign your Trademark application with the US Patent and Trademark Office (USPTO). Unfortunately, the 14-day deadline for your e-signature has passed and your trademark filing was not completed.
We can reprocess your Trademark application at your earliest convenience, however, you must contact us immediately. You can call us at the number below or simply reply to this email with your instructions to reprocess your application.
Please do not hesitate to contact Customer Care if you have any questions. You can simply reply to this email or call us toll-free at (800) 773-0888 Monday-Friday, 6:00am-7:00pm PST.
Thanks again for using LegalZoom.com. We look forward to serving you with your future legal document needs.
Best regards,
The LegalZoom Team {!snippetVariable.ccphone} | {!snippetVariable.lz_address}
This is a service email related to your LegalZoom account. For more information about how LegalZoom uses your information, please see the Privacy Policy: http://www.legalzoom.com/privacy-policy-popup.html
LegalZoom provides access to independent attorneys and self-help services at your specific direction. We are not a law firm or a substitute for an attorney or law firm. Prices, features, terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. LegalZoom is located at 9900 Spectrum Drive, Austin, TX 78717.
Please add services@emails.legalzoom.com to your address book.
This email was sent to: {!Contact.Email}
Â© LegalZoom.com, Inc. All rights reserved.
